channel.title: code-quality on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in code-quality on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 25: NDepend with Patrick Smacchia
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Patrick Smacchia, all the way from the beautiful island of Mauritius, to chat all about NDepend! An amazing tool for analysing .NET projects and displaying tons of useful information to help improve code quality. From scanning for code quality issues, to showing plenty of dependency graphs and code visualisations. Links from the show NDepend NDepend use cases NDepend blog Patrick’s WSL2 blog post mentioned in his dev tip LINQPad
